channel.title: Need someone to help code server
channel.description: Im really looking for a good coder i have some what experience but not enough to do everything on my own. I do not have a source yet, but the source will most likely be a 317. This server will go far with the right help. I am 15 years old and majoring in computer programming. and thats really it. so thanks.

item.title: Need someone to help code server
item.dc:creator: @rsg0d rsg0d
item.description:
@rsg0d wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:3, topic:414476”][quote author=Coelho link=topic=516445.msg3748472#msg3748472 date=1315861691]

  1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related questions will be locked. Requesting a host, ‘coder’/programmer, server or client, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too.

[/quote]

I don’t get it, you say your majoring in programming, but you can’t code on your own and need help. Also how to you major in anything if your only 15? I’m 15 and an ok programmer, but I highly doubt you will do anything to help on the coding side of things.[/quote]
GOING INTO THE MAJOR it has been my first week. my high school offers majors…

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone to help code server

item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Coelho, post:2, topic:414476”][quote]

  1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related questions will be locked. Requesting a host, ‘coder’/programmer, server or client, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too.
    [/quote][/quote]

I don’t get it, you say your majoring in programming, but you can’t code on your own and need help. Also how to you major in anything if your only 15? I’m 15 and an ok programmer, but I highly doubt you will do anything to help on the coding side of things.
